decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of six months from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Site location plan; A102 + A202 Rev. 1 (Existing and proposed ground floor plan); A103 + A203 Rev. 1 (Existing and proposed first floor plan); A104 + A204 Rev. 1 (Existing and proposed loft plan); A105 + A205 Rev. 1 (Existing and proposed roof plan); A106 + A206 Rev. 1 (Existing and proposed section 1); A107 + A207 Rev. 1 (Existing and proposed section 2); A108 + A208 Rev. 1 (Existing and proposed front elevation); A109 + A209 Rev. 1 (Existing and proposed rear elevation); A110 + A210 Rev. 1 (Existing and proposed side elevation 1); A111 + A211 Rev. 1 (Existing and proposed side elevation 2); Proposed 3D Rev. 1 (revisions received 26.01.2022)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), The Hanwell Village Green Conservation Area Management Plan and Appraisal (2008), policy D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| All proposed roof lights shall be of the non-projecting conservation area type and shall be installed flush with the plane of the roof and shall be retained as such thereafter.

Reason: In the interests of ensuring a high quality of design that preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the Creffield Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Rear dormer roof extension; and installation of five rooflights to roof space (following demolition of existing rear dormer roof extension)
